title: Mahala Višnjica
text:
Mahala Višnjica is a <a href="village">village</a> in the <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">municipality</a> of <a href="Kiseljak">Kiseljak</a>, <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a>.
Demographics.
According to the 2013 census, its population was nil, down from 14 in 1991.
